kodkod.ast
Class NaryExpression

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.ast.Node
      kodkod.ast.Expression
          kodkod.ast.NaryExpression
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Expression>
public final class NaryExpression
extends Expression
implements Iterable<Expression>

A relational expression with more than two children, composed with an nary operator.

Author:
Emina Torlak
invariant:
op.nary()
#children > 2
specfield:
op: ExprOperator
